name: Grokmar the Shrewd
title: Swamp Trader
description: A lean, weathered orc with intelligent eyes and a calculating demeanor. His shop smells of swamp moss and preservatives, stocked with gear suited for harsh wetland survival.

greeting.first_time: You need supplies for the marsh? Good. I am Grokmar. I trade fairlyâ€”more than most would in these lands. What do you seek?
greeting.returning: You return. This is smart. What do you need?
greeting.low_gold: I have little coin left today. Come back when the sun rises if you wish to sell.

sleeping.text: *snoring* Grrr... no business now. Come back later.

traveling_to_work.text: Going to shop. Marsh waits for no one. Visit if you need gear that won't fail you.

traveling_home.text: Shop closed. I return to my hut. You come tomorrow if you need supplies.

off_duty.text: No business now. Go to my shop during the day. That is when I trade.

browse_shop.text: Look. Everything here will keep you alive in the swamp. Weak gear gets you killed. Mine does not.

sell_items.text: You have goods to trade? Show me. If they have value and I have coin, we make deal.
sell_items.failure: No coin left. Marsh spirits were generous to others today. Return tomorrow.

ask_about_survival.text: The swamp does not forgive mistakes. Waterproof your gear. Watch for quicksand. Trust nothing that glows at night. Follow these rules, you live. Ignore them, you die. Simple.

goodbye.text: Go. Stay sharp. The marsh tests everyone.
